name: League of Heroes (itch)
description:
Tips: Keep in mind that you will be stronger if you summon more heroes to fight together. Fighting alone is not a good idea!

!!! When saving heroes, please only attack them once to cut the rope, there is a bug, if you attack them too much will not unlock the next hero 

Defeat the monsters, boss in the dungeon with your Heroes!

Left Click to perform melee attacks.

Right Click to select attack target for your summoned Heroes.

Kill monsters to gain soul and gold.

Use soul to summon more heroes, so they will become stronger when they are togther.

Use gold to upgrade skills.
